name: RAIDEN FIGHTERS ACES
description: This game supports English only. Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". The hottest battle is back after the decade!The legendary shooting arcade game, [RAIDEN FIGHTERS] is back with Xbox360!The three titles in the RAIDEN FIGHTERS series is ported into one package,which includes some new functions like Score Upload or Game Clip.Get the highest score in the world via Xbox LIVE! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
